job.title: Software Engineer I (Java/Cloud)
job.description: pThe successful candidate must be proficient in at least one programming language ie JavaC understand OOP and RDBMS concepts Must be able to learn and directly contribute to the design and delivery of applicationsnbspnbspppbrpp	Participate in the complete software development lifecycle from requirements through testingpp	Assists in the construction testing and debugging of programs in accordance with engineering standardspp	Maintains and documents programs in accordance with engineering standardspp	Maintains technical specifications according to the changes introduced to the code and assist in development of new technical specificationspp	Suggest estimates of efforts required to implement assigned tasks according to the schedule defined by technical managementpp	Other duties as required to support and meet the needs of the organizationppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpp	Bachelors Degree in process or completed in related field of study or equivalent experiencepp	Up to 4 years of software development experiencepp	Experience with Java 8 or abovenbsppp	Experience with 1 or more of the followingpp	o	Web technologies HTML5 JavaScript JQuery RESTpp	Experience with one or more RDBMS Ie proficient in SQLpp	Understand OOP and RDBMS conceptspp	Knowledge of SDLCpp	Good interpersonal communications skills and ability to work independentlypp	Strong analytical and problem solving skills and proficient technical writingpp	Working knowledge of Software Version Control systemspp	Preferred Experience with microservices based architecture and AWSppp
